p: C. europaea was collected from the Imouzzer region at the Middle Atlas Mountains, Morocco in April 2018. The plant was authenticated by the botanist Bari Amina, and given the voucher specimen#18I4C001 before being deposited at the herbarium of the Department of Biology, Faculty of Sciences Dhar El Mahraz, Sidi Mohammed BenAbdallah Fes University, Morocco. Afterward, the aerial parts were dried in the shade in a well-ventilated room for one week before being ground into powder using a blender.
